opis: Nudimo samostojeću kamenu kuću sa dva stana na top poziciji na 700m do mora. Ova pažljivo renovirana i potpuno opremljena kuća ukupne površine 250m2 se nalazi na prostranoj okućnici od 1100 m2 sa ljetnom kuhinjom i vinskom kućicom te konobom od 56m2 sa cisternom. Na okućnici se nalazi ruševina od koje je moguće napraviti još 4 stambene jedinice! Okućnica je ograđena i ispunjena zelenilom, postoji mogućnost izgradnje bazena. U sklopu okućnice se nalazi prostor za više parkirnih mjesta. Kuća je renovirana 2017. godine (promijenjene sve instalacije, podovi i krov) i priključena na kanalizaciju. U prizemlju se nalazi stan s kuhinjom, blagovaonom, dnevnim boravkom, dvije spavaće sobe i kupaone. Drugi stan na prvom katu se sastoji od kuhinje, blagovaone, dnevnog boravka, hodnika, kupaone i spavaće sobe. Jedinstvena prilika za ljubitelje istarskog šarma. Ova tradicionalna istarska kuća pruža izvanrednu mogućnost stvaranja autentičnog istarskog doma. --- We offer a detached stone house with two apartments in a top position 700m from the sea. This carefully renovated and fully equipped house with a total area of ​​250m2 is located on a spacious garden of 1100 m2 with a summer kitchen and wine house and a 56m2 tavern with a cistern. There is a ruin on the garden that can be used to make 4 more residential units! The garden is fenced and filled with greenery, there is a possibility of building a swimming pool. There is space for several parking spaces within the garden. The house was renovated in 2017 (all installations, floors and roof changed) and connected to the sewerage system. On the ground floor there is an apartment with a kitchen, dining room, living room, two bedrooms and a bathroom. The second apartment on the first floor consists of a kitchen, dining room, living room, hallway, bathroom and bedroom. A unique opportunity for lovers of Istrian charm. This traditional Istrian house offers an extraordinary opportunity to create an authentic Istrian home.
